extDescription.message: Deletes all data except for bookmarked sites

cleanButtonText.description: Text on the main clean button

advancedSettingsToggleLabel.description: Label for the advanced settings toggle

dataTypesHeader.description: Header for the data types section

showLogsToggleLabel.description: Label for the show logs toggle

bookmarksCountLabel.description: Label for the bookmarked sites count statistic

lastCleanedTimeLabel.description: Label for the last cleaned time statistic

statusInvalidUrlsFound.message: Warning: $1 invalid URL(s) found in bookmarks:
statusInvalidUrlsFound.description: Warning message when invalid URLs are found. $1 is the count.

statusCleaningSuccess.description: Success message after cleaning. $1 is the number of preserved domains.

statusCleaningError.description: Error message during cleaning. $1 is the error message.

statusConnectionInterrupted.message: Connection to cleaning service was interrupted.
statusConnectionInterrupted.description: Error message when the connection to background script is lost.

statusConnectionInterruptedError.message: Connection to cleaning service was interrupted: $1
statusConnectionInterruptedError.description: Error message when the connection to background script is lost, with error details. $1 is the error message.

statusGenericError.description: Generic error message. $1 is the error message.

invalidDateText.description: Text shown when the last cleaned date cannot be formatted.

invalidDateFormat.description: Text shown when the date format is invalid.

errorLoadingSettings.description: Console error message when loading settings fails.

errorDuringCleanup.description: Console error message during the cleaning process.

errorLoadingOrDisplayingStats.description: Console error message when loading/displaying stats fails.

notification_error_fallback.message: An error occurred while displaying the notification
notification_error_fallback.description: Error message when notification display fails

notification_image_error.description: Error message for notification image loading issues

notification_retry.description: Message when retrying after an error

confirmReset.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings?

checkboxNotFound.message: Checkbox not found for data type: $1

settingsPanelNotAvailable.message: Settings panel not available for visibility toggle

statusPortDisconnectedErrorDetail.message: Connection to cleaning service was interrupted: $1

statusPortDisconnectedError.message: Connection to cleaning service was interrupted.
